sentences.en: A Hindu ascetic, or sadhu, wrapped in a bright-red cloth, smokes underneath a vad (banyan) tree outside a temple in Mumbai (Bombay), India.
sentences.cn: 印度孟买，一个教禁欲主义者或苦行僧，包裹在明亮的红色衣服里，在榕树下吸烟。

sentences.en: Swami Vishwanath Deo is a sadhu living in a temple on the banks of Yamuna.
sentences.cn: 史瓦弥是居住在亚穆纳河河岸神殿的圣人.
